basic.description: This course discusses the most important data analytics and mining techniques to support data-driven decision making and help corporations acquire knowledge from large data sets. Specifically, it introduces methods such as clustering, classification, association rule mining, etc. through a hands-on approach using specialized software.
basic.subject: ISM
basic.title: Data Analytics and Mining for Business

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ISM 4212 and STA 2023 or equivalent.
